Package Extbase\Persistence\Exception

Class summary

Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Exception_CleanStateNotMemorized An "Invalid Class" exception
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Exception_InvalidClass An "Invalid Class" exception
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Exception_InvalidPropertyType An "Invalid Property Type" exception
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Exception_MissingBackend A "Missing Backend" exception
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Extbase_RepositoryException Main exception thrown by classes in this package. May contain an error message and/or another nested exception.
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Exception_TooDirty A "Too Dirty" exception
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Exception_UnknownObject An "Unknown Object" exception
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Exception_UnsupportedMethod An "Unsupported Method" exception
Tx_Extbase_Persistence_Exception_ValueFormatException Exception thrown when an attempt is made to assign a value to a property that has an invalid format, given the type of the property. Also thrown if an attempt is made to read the value of a property using a type-specific read method of a type into which it is not convertible.
